description: Alterations and additions to the existing school, including the conversion of the roof space in the north and south wings, additional floorspace to centre piece and rebuilding of the south west corner part of the existing building, erection of a glass canopy to to the main north entrance
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawing Numbers 2014/739/P/01, 2014/739/P/02, 2014/739/P/03, 2014/739/P/04, 2014/739/P/05, 2014/739/P/06, 2014/739/P/07, 2104/739/P/08, 2014/739/P/09, 2014/739/P/10, 2014/739/P/11, 2014/739/P/12, 2014/739/P/13, 2014/739/P/14, 2014/739/P/15, 2014/739/P/16, 2014/739/P17, 2014/739/P18, 2014/739/P/19, 2014/739/P/20, 2014/739/P/21, 2014/739/P/22, 2014/739/P23, FSS/13053/01:01 X3, Design and Access Statement, Fire Safety Strategy, Supplementary Statement, Travel Plan and Transport Statement, BREEAM report, Energy Statement, Sustainability Statement received 09/05/14  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and none shall take place on Weekends and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extensions hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted for educational purposes shall not be begun until the details approved under application 00535/139/P5(3,6,7,9) dated 08/04/13 to insulate the premises against the transmission of airborne and impact sound has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given.

Condition : 7 - Development shall take place, including any works of demolition, in accordance with the Landscaping  Plan approved by the local planning authority under application 00535/139/P5(3,6,7,9) on 08/04/13.
Condition : 8 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out and operated at all times in accordance with the approved Capita Symonds Travel Plan received 02/04/12.

Condition : 9 - Development shall take place, including any works of demolition, in accordance with the Waste and Recycling details approved by the local planning authority under application 00535/139/P5(3,6,7,9) on 08/04/13.
Condition : 10 - The gates to the development hereby approved shall open inwards only.

Condition : 11 - Development shall take place, including any works of demolition, in accordance with the Construction Method Statement/Logistics Plan approved by the local planning authority under application 00535/139/P5(11) on 23/12/13.
